attributes.review: No do NOT get this app!!!!! First of all it didn’t let me put my phone number in then once I got that to work then it said it was tracking me!!!😤😤😤😤 I was furious why would it track me!!!
attributes.title: NOT GOOD 🤢🤢🤢

attributes.review: Absolutely trash, lags all the time and made my phone freeze 10/10 would not recommend
attributes.title: no

attributes.review: I DOWNLOADED THIS APP TO SUPPORT MY PRESIDENT AND I WAS THOROUGHLY DISAPPOINTED. Glitches so bad my phone was turning on and off BY ITSELF! I had to buy an entirely new phone because I could not remove the app from my device. DO NOT waste your time and spare yourself the trouble. WORTHLESS.
attributes.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME

attributes.review: within seven seconds of installing the app the microwave and refrigerator were stolen w a note saying “we’re coming for your toilet next”. we are all so scared, avoid all of this and don’t get the app!!
attributes.title: DONT INSTALL APP

attributes.review: this app is horrible , took 6 hours to download just wasted my time !! if i was able to give it zero stars i would ! remember trump is orange , basically an oompa loompa. why would you ever trust an oompa loompa? DO NOT GET THIS APP goodbye❤️
attributes.title: awful 🤬🤬🤬

attributes.review: I had this app for couple days and it so bad it’s laggy, sometimes it’s saids the n word. apple should just take this app out .  It’s was worst experience ever. This app is just a waste of space.
attributes.title: So bad

attributes.review: this app is absolutely awful so many bugs and crashes😧NEEDS REMOVED!!!  i just wanted to download the trump app and have never been more disappointed😔
attributes.title: awful app😡

attributes.review:
This app was really disappointing donald 🙁 I hoped that with you been the president you could of made a better app, but this is just not it 😞 I loved you so much but this is a big let down for us trumpies #Trumpie4Life 😜🙁 However Please do NOT download this app! 😅 It WILL give ur device a virus and it will NOT work for the rest of the day/year depending how cheap ur phone is!!!!😜😁👎🏻

STAY SAFE 😁💯🙏

Much Love 
Karen Johnson! 🙏😔💯 

#DONOTMESSWITHTIKTOK/GENZ 🥰
attributes.title: THE WORST APP EVER SUCH A LET DOWN 💯☹️

attributes.review: The app says you need to be 17+ to have it. My 2 year old daughter is a very strong Trump supporter. She wanted this app and I’m mad she can’t view it because of these age limits. What are y’all doing that’s age restricted??✨🧚‍♀️
attributes.title: Really?

attributes.review: This app literally gave my phone a virus so bad that I had to get a completely new phone. Would rate 0 stars if I could. 0/10, do not recommend.
attributes.title: Awful 🤮🤮🤢
